title: spack attribute error on 'package'
body:
On a vanilla Redhat 6.8 box, I check out a copy of spack and try to run `spack install zeromq`. or other package from `spack list`, I also tried a higher python (2.7.x) with similar results. What am I missing?

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/ccs/home/f7b/spack/bin/spack", line 212, in <module>
    main(sys.argv)
  File "/ccs/home/f7b/spack/bin/spack", line 208, in main
    _main(args, unknown)
  File "/ccs/home/f7b/spack/bin/spack", line 174, in _main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 317, in install
    specs = spack.cmd.parse_specs(args.package, concretize=True)
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py", line 118, in parse_specs
    spec.concretize()  # implies normalize
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1521, in concretize
    self._expand_virtual_packages(),
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1438, in _expand_virtual_packages
    spec)
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 121, in choose_virtual_or_external
    candidates = self._valid_virtuals_and_externals(spec)
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 80, in _valid_virtuals_and_externals
    if is_spec_buildable(cspec):
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/package_prefs.py", line 260, in is_spec_buildable
    allpkgs = get_packages_config()
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/package_prefs.py", line 40, in get_packages_config
    if spack.repo.is_virtual(pkg_name)]
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/repository.py", line 348, in is_virtual
    return pkg_name in self.provider_index
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/repository.py", line 234, in provider_index
    self._provider_index.merge(repo.provider_index)
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/repository.py", line 653, in provider_index
    self._update_provider_index()
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/repository.py", line 647, in _update_provider_index
    self._provider_index.to_yaml(new)
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/lock.py", line 312, in __exit__
    if self._as.__exit__(type, value, traceback):
  File "/autofs/xf-svm1_home2/f7b/spack/lib/spack/spack/file_cache.py", line 152, in __exit__
    raise value
AttributeError: package
```
